definition: chip (in gambling)/token (for counting)/ticket/to prepare/to plan/to raise (funds)/resource/means
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: Julian came up with another of his hare-brained schemes for raising money.
sentences.chinese: 朱利安又提出了一个愚蠢的筹款计划。

sentences.english: The bill, which has 31 co-sponsors, has been forwarded to the House Ways and Means Committee for consideration.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案已提交众议院筹款委员会审议。

sentences.english: The purpose of this event is to raise funds for Typhoon Morakot victims.
sentences.chinese: 这次的活动是为了替莫拉克台风的灾民筹款。

sentences.english: A few days before the election, I went down to New York for a long-planned fund-raiser.
sentences.chinese: 选举日前几天，我去纽约参加一个筹划已久的筹款会。

sentences.english: Chapters of Medical Students for Choice fundraise in order for members to attend the national conference.
sentences.chinese: 自由医学社团筹款旨在为让成员们参加全国性的会议。

sentences.english: Local tradespeople have generously contributed to the appeal to raise money for the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 当地的商人慷慨地回应这次呼吁，为医院筹款。

sentences.english: Please mail the original bank-in slip and this form to the SPCA Fund-raising Department.
sentences.chinese: 请将入數纸正本及此表格寄回本会筹款部。

sentences.english: Fiennes climbed the mountain to raise funds for cancer charity Marie Curie.
sentences.chinese: 他此次攀登珠峰是为了给居里癌症基金会筹款。

sentences.english: Blue Box is not just a pushke into which coins are put.
sentences.chinese: 这个蓝色的筹款盒不只是我们投放善款的普通盒子。

sentences.english: He made contacts with wealthy people in raising money for the project.
sentences.chinese: 为该项工程筹款他与许多有钱人拉关系。

sentences.english: The first job is meeting the fundraising target. Everything else seems cheap.
sentences.chinese: 首要工作是达到筹款目标，其他事情都是不重要。

sentences.english: Some programs help students raise money from schools and local organizations.
sentences.chinese: 有些项目也会帮助学生向所申请学校或当地组织筹款。

sentences.english: I raise money for children's hospital.
Many charity events or fundraisers are black tie affairs.
sentences.chinese: 许多筹款慈善晚会成为黑领结嘉宾集会。

sentences.english: Volunteers helping out fundraising for the earthquake victims.
sentences.chinese: 义工们为地震灾民筹款出钱出力。

sentences.english: Every year the Wikimedia Foundation sets a goal that it knows will be a stretch.
sentences.chinese: 每年，维基媒体基金会都会增加其筹款目标。

definition: to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to contribute generously (idiom); help sb generously with money/to give generously to charity
to donate goods (to a relief effort)/to contribute material
